APPLOGIN Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

APPLOGIN is the servlet from which a non-web app may request a session, given successful authentication of a user and password passed in as parameters.

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)
